Funny usage message Lars Kellogg-Stedman
http://blog.oddbit.com/post/2010-02-08-funny-usage-message/ 2010-02-08T00:00:00Z 2010-02-08T00:00:00Z I was poking around in a command shell on my Droid to see what was available. While it’s a pretty restricted environment, there’s a number of commands available in /system/bin, including dexopt. Apparently dexopt isn’t something I’m supposed to poke at: $ dexopt Usage: don't use this Hah.
